# ksql_stream (Resource)

Provides a KSQL Stream resource.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name of the stream.
- `query` (String) The statement to create the stream

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
